Name: Goblin
Description:
Green, size of a toddler.. 
bet you could punt it
$^)

Name: Slime
Description: Its a slime :P

Name: Rock
Description: A rock??

Name: Witch
Description: moley moley moley mole..

Name: Mornbody
Description: An entity embodying grief

Name: Tranceserpent
Description: Like a foggy mirror! Hits like a truck tho ;O

Name: Terrorling
Description: A small and condensed entity of terror.

Name: MystSoul
Description:
The real mystery, whos soul? 
One of the servents of Mien

Name: Ghost
Description: Woah! Spoopy..

Name: Steamfreak
Description: One who can harrness the shroud.

Name: The Calm Man
Description: A strangly calm man stands before you..

Name: Hollowlich
Description: All it takes is looking into the eyes of this creature to understand its name.

Name: Crypthound
Description: Fabled to be one of the keepers for the gates of the underworld.

Name: Abyssthing
Description: An entity with origins in the abyssal realm, best dispatch it quickly!

Name: ArcticSavage
Description: A savage its origins are prehistoric.

Name: Vampbeast
Description: Both a beast and a vampire, some might say that breaks all the rules.

Name: Gravecrackle
Description: The last thing you hear is the crumbling of a granite stone..

Name: The Fiery Bane Bee
Description: Ayo what da bee doin?

Name: Eli
Description: Eli the Destroyer

Name: Ghoul Fly
Description: This large fly feasts on living and dead flesh.

Name: Snakeflare
Description: A snake.. or is it a flare?

Name: Pink Beaver
Description: ... it's just a beaver painted pink :o

Name: Mystling
Description:
Younger cousin of the mystsoul. 
One of the servents of Mien

Name: Hauntsnare
Description:
This creature will freeze you in your tracks with only a look! 
One of the servents of Dyvulla.

Name: Crimson Crow
Description: A blood soaked crow.. best take care with this beast!

Name: Rage Deer
Description: It must be mating season ;O

Name: Thornbug
Description: An insect covered in pointy thorns.. ouch

Name: Swarmwing
Description:
Watch out for their numbers, they never travel alone.. 
unlike you

Name: Smogwoman
Description: An entity somewhat resembling a woman, the dark cloud around it warns caution

Name: Icetooth
Description: An icy tooth imbued with magic!

Name: Flailplant
Description: Its a plant, and its flailing.. *WACK* ouchie.. try not to get hit

Name: Muckbrute
Description: A muddy angry mess of a creature, all it sees is red

Name: Devouring Trapper
Description: Falling into its traps.. I'm sure you know what happens next

Name: Dream Assasin
Description:
Sleeping with one eye open won't save you from this adept assasin! 
One of the servents of Fayrn

Name: Unthinkable Faerie
Description: Inconceivable!

Name: Cavecrash Striker
Description: It's fabled these creatures collapse caves while miners work as a favoured pastime

Name: Soilmirage
Description:
What might look like a normal mirage could very well be one of these 
Never hesitate to stab the ground!

Name: Wind Satyr
Description: A Satyr belonging to the wind tribe

Name: Aurahound
Description: These hounds feed off the aura of other living creatures.. scary!

Name: Bone Squirrel
Description: WOAH IS THAT A SQUIRREL!

Name: Chaosspore Newt
Description:
Despite its name this creature is actually quite deadly and should be avoided unless unavoidable!! 
One of the servents of Zimmir

Name: Rust Maw Medusa
Description:
This creature can turn you to stone with one look.. oh wait, those snakes are fake.. 
It might give you tetnus

Name: Vorpal Slayer
Description: Very few have ever seen one of these and lived to give a report.. this should be a cake walk!

Name: Change Sprite
Description: This freindly looking sprite tends to change its tune without provocation

Name: Soulspike
Description:
A spike with the explict goal of stealing souls. 
One of the servents of Wadon

Name: The Giant Malformation
Description: EWWW WHAT IS THAT!!

Name: Bane Crawler
Description: It- It's a really big spider.. KILL IT!! KILL IT NOW!!

Name: Battlestealth Berserker
Description: These fighters are known but not seen, to see one means your life will soon be over.

Name: Hill Soaker
Description: The only two known facts about this entity are that it exists.. and that it only leaves the blood of its victims behind

Name: Phantomsword
Description: This ghostly weapon will cut you in half with a single strike :o

Name: Mountaincrash Striker
Description: A much bigger and stronger striker varient

Name: Bloodshock Beholder
Description: Its name comes from an imperfect translation of a forgotten dialect!

Name: Flaming Mouth
Description: Ahhhh thats hawt

Name: Spellstench Heap
Description: An amalgimation of used spells and the essence of those who cast them.

Name: Damned Troll
Description: A troll from the depths of the underworld

Name: Ancient Celestial-fungus
Description: This fungus has origins predating all known life in this realm.

Name: Chaotic Venom Titan
Description: Predicting its next move is like teaching a newborn the social hierarchy

Name: Mysterious Boss-charmer
Description: A fellow adventurer corrupted by the gods

Name: Krelya, The Soulreaper
Description:
Krelya is the second hand to Wadon, God of Souls.. 
This fight will not be easy.

Name: Dark Daemon
Description:
A daemon of the dark coven.. 
One of the servents of Dyvulla.

Name: Evil Shadow
Description:
Its just a shadow nothing to worry about im sure.. 
One of the servents of Dyvulla.

Name: Harlpei, Fire Scale
Description: Origins are fabled to be from the Fire Scale tribe at the bottom of the ocean.

Name: Bla$tym
Description:
An explosive creature. 
One of the servents of Nizdea.

Name: $caklyd
Description:
These creatures roam the ocean depths until fully matured. 
One of the servents of Nizdea.

Name: Phase Troll
Description: A Troll with phase abilities, not to be taken lightly.

Name: Vampbug
Description: A bug with a liking for blood

Name: Vortexserpent
Description: A hailstrom of slithering

Name: Cursemutant
Description: A human cursed and distorted with malace.

Name: Fogstep
Description: A fully developed Fogling is able to use a small amount of magical power

Name: Steamstep
Description: A stronger and more volatile entity belonging to the Fog family

Name: Titanium Thunder Scorpion
Description: This insect has a hardend shell with highly conductive properties

Name: Gastalon
Description: A bloated creature, hit it hard, really hard

Name: Tombling
Description: This small impish creature can be found near crypts and tombs

Name: Warpman
Description: A man consumed by the power of the warp

Name: Smoghag
Description: A witch shrouded in a toxic smog

Name: Soulgolem
Description:
A massive golem infused with souls of the dammed 
One of the servants of Wadon

Name: The Dark Thing
Description:
An entity wrapped in darkness 
One of the servants of Dyvulla

Name: Curseteeth
Description: A cursed mass of teeth thirsting for flesh.

Name: Bonebug
Description: The size of a cat, a shell made of human bones..

Name: Bowelscreamer
Description:
This monster rips its victims to ribons before letting a screech of victory siginalling a kill 
One of the servants of Ados

Name: Fogling
Description: A small ethereal being bursting with power, known to become much stronger with age

Name: Cindermorph
Description: The condensate of both weak magical power and the ashes of a fire 'make sure you soak the stones, lest you summon a morph'

Name: Poisonedgirl
Description: A poor soul fallen ill to the sickness, too much of a good thing can never be good for long

Name: Ashgolem
Description: These devious golems carry all the tools for starting fires, they encourage the creation of Cinder Morphs

Name: Grimeface
Description: The slimy remains of those who have been corrupted, usually found roaming in groups

Name: Savage Frost Serpent
Description: The glint of its scales should be the first sign to either draw your weapon or run

Name: Metallich
Description: This metalic creature breaks most undead rules.. totally metal!

Name: Soultaur
Description: Condensed souls, refined through battle, the product of which makes up Wadons upper ranks!

Name: The Child of Fayrn
Description: There will surely be no haven, waken nor dreamt, should you end this fight the victor...

Name: Buldak, The Spicy
Description: You've done enough, and that is where your living participation ends..
